Title: Encanto
Plot: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.
Tagline: There's a little magic in all of us ...almost all of us.
Directors: Jared Bush, Byron Howard, Charise Castro Smith
Writers: Charise Castro Smith, Jared Bush, Byron Howard
Stars: Stephanie Beatriz, María Cecilia Botero, John Leguizamo
